trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory hybrid identity design considerations - Determine hybrid identity management tasks | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory hybrid identity design considerations - Determine hybrid identity management tasks | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: With Conditional access control, Azure Active Directory checks the specific conditions you pick when authenticating the user and before allowing access to the application.
trans-unit.target: With Conditional access control, Azure Active Directory checks the specific conditions you pick when authenticating the user and before allowing access to the application.

trans-unit.source: Once those conditions are met, the user is authenticated and allowed access to the application.
trans-unit.target: Once those conditions are met, the user is authenticated and allowed access to the application.

trans-unit.source: Plan for Hybrid Identity Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: Plan for Hybrid Identity Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: Identity is one of the foundations of your enterprise mobility and application access strategy.
trans-unit.target: Identity is one of the foundations of your enterprise mobility and application access strategy.

trans-unit.source: Whether you are signing on to your mobile device or SaaS app, your identity is the key to gaining access to everything.
trans-unit.target: Whether you are signing on to your mobile device or SaaS app, your identity is the key to gaining access to everything.

trans-unit.source: At its highest level, an identity management solution encompasses unifying and syncing between your identity repositories which includes automating and centralizing the process of provisioning resources.
trans-unit.target: At its highest level, an identity management solution encompasses unifying and syncing between your identity repositories which includes automating and centralizing the process of provisioning resources.

trans-unit.source: The identity solution should be a centralized identity across on-premises and cloud and also use some form of identity federation to maintain centralized authentication and securely share and collaborate with external users and businesses.
trans-unit.target: The identity solution should be a centralized identity across on-premises and cloud and also use some form of identity federation to maintain centralized authentication and securely share and collaborate with external users and businesses.

trans-unit.source: Resources range from operating systems and applications to people in, or affiliated with, an organization.
trans-unit.target: Resources range from operating systems and applications to people in, or affiliated with, an organization.

trans-unit.source: Organizational structure can be altered to accommodate the provisioning policies and procedures.
trans-unit.target: Organizational structure can be altered to accommodate the provisioning policies and procedures.

trans-unit.source: It is also important to have an identity solution geared to empower your users by providing them with self-service experiences to keep them productive.
trans-unit.target: It is also important to have an identity solution geared to empower your users by providing them with self-service experiences to keep them productive.

trans-unit.source: Your identity solution is more robust if it enables single sign-on for users across all the resources they need access Administrators at all levels can use standardized procedures for managing user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Your identity solution is more robust if it enables single sign-on for users across all the resources they need access Administrators at all levels can use standardized procedures for managing user credentials.

trans-unit.source: Some levels of administration can be reduced or eliminated, depending on the breadth of the provisioning management solution.
trans-unit.target: Some levels of administration can be reduced or eliminated, depending on the breadth of the provisioning management solution.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, you can securely distribute administration capabilities, manually or automatically, among various organizations.
trans-unit.target: Furthermore, you can securely distribute administration capabilities, manually or automatically, among various organizations.

trans-unit.source: For example, a domain administrator can serve only the people and resources in that domain.
trans-unit.target: For example, a domain administrator can serve only the people and resources in that domain.

trans-unit.source: This user can do administrative and provisioning tasks, but is not authorized to do configuration tasks, such as creating workflows.
trans-unit.target: This user can do administrative and provisioning tasks, but is not authorized to do configuration tasks, such as creating workflows.

trans-unit.source: Determine Hybrid Identity Management Tasks
trans-unit.target: Determine Hybrid Identity Management Tasks

trans-unit.source: Distributing administrative tasks in your organization improves the accuracy and effectiveness of administration and improves the balance of the workload of an organization.
trans-unit.target: Distributing administrative tasks in your organization improves the accuracy and effectiveness of administration and improves the balance of the workload of an organization.

trans-unit.source: Following are the pivots that define a robust identity management system.
trans-unit.target: Following are the pivots that define a robust identity management system.

trans-unit.source: To define hybrid identity management tasks, you must understand some essential characteristics of the organization that will be adopting hybrid identity.
trans-unit.target: To define hybrid identity management tasks, you must understand some essential characteristics of the organization that will be adopting hybrid identity.

trans-unit.source: It is important to understand the current repositories being used for identity sources.
trans-unit.target: It is important to understand the current repositories being used for identity sources.

trans-unit.source: By knowing those core elements, you will have the foundational requirements and based on that you will need to ask more granular questions that will lead you to a better design decision for your Identity solution.
trans-unit.target: By knowing those core elements, you will have the foundational requirements and based on that you will need to ask more granular questions that will lead you to a better design decision for your Identity solution.

trans-unit.source: While defining those requirements, ensure that at least the following questions are answered
trans-unit.target: While defining those requirements, ensure that at least the following questions are answered

trans-unit.source: Provisioning options:
trans-unit.target: Provisioning options:

trans-unit.source: Does the hybrid identity solution support a robust account access management and provisioning system?
trans-unit.target: Does the hybrid identity solution support a robust account access management and provisioning system?

trans-unit.source: How are users, groups, and passwords going to be managed?
trans-unit.target: How are users, groups, and passwords going to be managed?

trans-unit.source: Is the identity lifecycle management responsive?
trans-unit.target: Is the identity lifecycle management responsive?

trans-unit.source: How long does password updates account suspension take?
trans-unit.target: How long does password updates account suspension take?

trans-unit.source: License management:
trans-unit.target: License management:

trans-unit.source: Does the hybrid identity solution handles license management?
trans-unit.target: Does the hybrid identity solution handles license management?

trans-unit.source: If yes, what capabilities are available?
trans-unit.target: If yes, what capabilities are available?

trans-unit.source: Does the solution handle group-based license management?
trans-unit.target: Does the solution handle group-based license management?

trans-unit.source: - If yes, is it possible to assign a security group to it?
trans-unit.target: - If yes, is it possible to assign a security group to it?

trans-unit.source: - If yes, will the cloud directory automatically assign licenses to all the members of the group?
trans-unit.target: - If yes, will the cloud directory automatically assign licenses to all the members of the group?

trans-unit.source: - What happens if a user is subsequently added to, or removed from the group, will a license be automatically assigned or removed as appropriate?
trans-unit.target: - What happens if a user is subsequently added to, or removed from the group, will a license be automatically assigned or removed as appropriate?

trans-unit.source: Integration with other third-party identity providers:
trans-unit.target: Integration with other third-party identity providers:

trans-unit.source: Can this hybrid solution be integrated with third-party identity providers to implement single sign-on?
trans-unit.target: Can this hybrid solution be integrated with third-party identity providers to implement single sign-on?

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to unify all the different identity providers into a cohesive identity system?
trans-unit.target: Is it possible to unify all the different identity providers into a cohesive identity system?

trans-unit.source: If yes, how and which are they and what capabilities are available?
trans-unit.target: If yes, how and which are they and what capabilities are available?

trans-unit.source: Synchronization Management
trans-unit.target: Synchronization Management

trans-unit.source: One of the goals of an identity manager, to be able to bring all the identity providers and keep them synchronized.
trans-unit.target: One of the goals of an identity manager, to be able to bring all the identity providers and keep them synchronized.

trans-unit.source: You keep the data synchronized based on an authoritative master identity provider.
trans-unit.target: You keep the data synchronized based on an authoritative master identity provider.

trans-unit.source: In a hybrid identity scenario, with a synchronized management model, you manage all user and device identities in an on-premises server and synchronize the accounts and, optionally, passwords to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: In a hybrid identity scenario, with a synchronized management model, you manage all user and device identities in an on-premises server and synchronize the accounts and, optionally, passwords to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: The user enters the same password on-premises as he or she does in the cloud, and at sign-in, the password is verified by the identity solution.
trans-unit.target: The user enters the same password on-premises as he or she does in the cloud, and at sign-in, the password is verified by the identity solution.

trans-unit.source: This model uses a directory synchronization tool.
trans-unit.target: This model uses a directory synchronization tool.

trans-unit.source: To proper design the synchronization of your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered:
trans-unit.target: To proper design the synchronization of your hybrid identity solution ensure that the following questions are answered:

trans-unit.source: • What are the sync solutions available for the hybrid identity solution?
trans-unit.target: • What are the sync solutions available for the hybrid identity solution?

trans-unit.source: • What are the single sign on capabilities available?
trans-unit.target: • What are the single sign on capabilities available?

trans-unit.source: • What are the options for identity federation between B2B and B2C?
trans-unit.target: • What are the options for identity federation between B2B and B2C?

trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.target: Determine hybrid identity management adoption strategy
